title: Where to find client patch on new client?
body:
Where can I find the latest client patch on the new client?
In this type of format: 7.10.17_05_10_19_29
I tried to find it but couldn't ever since the legacy client died.

replies.body: You should see the current client version in the bottom right beside the Mission button. It's in a little black box with grey-ish text, so it might be a little hard to notice at first.
